description_for_model: Plugin for searching through the public datasets found on the Splitgraph data delivery network. These datasets typically originate from open government initiatives and may relate to epidemology, traffic engineering, urban planning, real estate prices, demographical trends, educational statistics, public infrastructure and services, taxation, public officials, etc. Since Splitgraph is queried with SQL, the generated SQL query returned by the plugin should be displayed to the user, so they may understand which dataset was used to generate the response.
description_for_human: Search through thousands of public datasets available on Splitgraph.com
